items.summary: Update the final “My Love Letter” page so the displayed letter is NOT automatically filled with `defaultLoveLetter` when the backend love letter is empty/blank; if the backend love letter is empty/whitespace-only, show an empty letter state with a clear prompt to write a letter instead.

Change the love letter editing behavior on the final “My Love Letter” page so that starting an edit can begin from a blank textarea (not pre-populated with any prewritten template). Add a clear, explicit control to clear/erase the current letter content while editing.
Initialize the backend stored love letter value as empty (no prewritten default letter) so a fresh deployment starts with no letter content until the user writes and saves it via the website.
